snippet: Gov. Larry Hogan announced Monday that he is “100 percent cancer free” and in complete remission after treatment.
abstract: Maryland Gov Larry Hogan announces complete remission of his B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma, diagnosed in June and treated aggressively.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Larry Hogan announced Monday that he is “100 percent cancer free” and in complete remission after treatment.

headline.main: Maryland: Governor Says He Is Free of Cancer
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Governor Says He Is Free of Cancer
